channel.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
channel.description:
It's official guys! We're (probably)[/SIZE] getting another L4D game before the next HL game! Yay! [quote="ValveTime"] Overkill and Valve are collaborating on some sort of crossover between Payday: The Heist and Left 4 Dead but we don't know exactly what this "blend" of the two games will actually be. CVG are claiming that the crossover is a new game that takes place before the events of the original Left 4 Dead. There is no source given for this statement which is simply [quote] We're now told its a game that will tell the story of the zombie outbreak that happened before the original Left 4 Dead games. [/quote] We're now told its a game that will tell the story of the zombie outbreak that happened before the original Left 4 Dead games.
In the mean time Valve have updated their in-game poll to ask Left 4 Dead 2 players if they will be attending PAX Prime this year. Perhaps we'll hear more info about this crossover there? [/quote] Relevant:
[url='https://www.computerandvideogames.com/352417/rumour-left-4-dead-prequel-coming-from-payday-dev/?cid=OTC-RSS&attr=CVG-General-RSS']https://www.computerandvideogames.com/352417/left-4-dead-prequel-coming-from-payday-dev/?cid=OTC-RSS&attr=CVG-General-RSS[/url]
[url='https://www.l4d.com/blog/post.php?id=8070']https://www.l4d.com/blog/post.php?id=8070[/url]
The name isn't L4D: The Prequel ofc- at least as far as I can tell. If it is, that isn't very clever.

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Good, because I was about to say: “WHAT THE FFFFFFFFFUCK, VALVE!”

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
I currently read a news where Chet has denied that Overkill and Valve are working on any L4D related game.

https://www.pcgamesn.com/article/valve-dismiss-left-4-dead-sequel-or-prequel-rumours-overkill-are-still-making-payday-heist-promise

From the forums:

We are not working on a full game - we got PD2 and PD1 to take care of.

Bo

https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?p=31074232#post31074232

Move along, nothing to see here.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
sersoft:

that’s it.

I’m pirating HL3 when (if) it comes out.

Just because Valve is taking their time with HL3? That sounds pretty stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
My guess is it’s a pay day DLC or L4D DLC. I doubt it’s a full-fledged game and doesn’t really even sound likes it has much involvement on Valve’s part besides giving the go-ahead. If it does turn out to be something Valve is heavily involved in then I’m pissed. I’m tired of L4D, that game was fun, now let it go before it becomes a cash cow.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
Medevilae:

Sounds ‘ok’, love how we have more info on the third Left 4 Dead game than the third Half Life game.

And I’m sorry <3

Yeah, what a kick in the nuts!

The cover art should be a hand with just the middle finger… it’s Valve’s statement to all HL2-Ep3/HL3 fans!

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
So it’s probably not a game. ‘Bo’ of Overkill apparently said on SPUF they aren’t working “on any full games” at the moment.

So if ‘Bo’ speaks the truth it’s probably going to be content for PD or L4D(2).

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
I’m both excited but also a little pissed off. If this is true, that’s 3 L4D games in the timespan since HL2Ep2. I mean, what the hell? Still love the L4D series though so this still peaks my interest.

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
It sounds like it could actually be cool. I don’t mind the lack of Half Life news if we get stuff like this instead.

Also, just because the beginning of the project was confirmed, doesn’t mean it will release first. Aliens: Colonial Marines was announced before Borderlands.

Read full topic

item.description:
Well, I love L4D2 and I really enjoy Payday(never thought I would though).

Really, this is pretty exciting for me tbh.

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
A rep of dev Overkill told CVG,

“As perceptive gamers will have noticed, several hints have recently been dropped into Payday: The Heist, which has led to various rumors,” a statement read. “We are excited to be able to confirm that an in-depth collaboration between Overkill and Valve is currently in production.”

“We are working on a very cool blend of Payday and Left 4 Dead. I am sure it is so exciting that it will have some players check into the hospital before we are done.”

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Today some random dude told me that it’s just DLC for Payday: The Heist, and not an actual game.

Can’t argue with a source like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead, the Prequel
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
It’s official guys! We’re (probably)[/SIZE] getting another L4D game before the next HL game! Yay!

ValveTime:

Overkill and Valve are collaborating on some sort of crossover between Payday: The Heist and Left 4 Dead but we don’t know exactly what this “blend” of the two games will actually be. CVG are claiming that the crossover is a new game that takes place before the events of the original Left 4 Dead. There is no source given for this statement which is simply

We’re now told its a game that will tell the story of the zombie outbreak that happened before the original Left 4 Dead games.

We’re now told its a game that will tell the story of the zombie outbreak that happened before the original Left 4 Dead games.

In the mean time Valve have updated their in-game poll to ask Left 4 Dead 2 players if they will be attending PAX Prime this year. Perhaps we’ll hear more info about this crossover there?

Relevant:

https://www.computerandvideogames.com/352417/left-4-dead-prequel-coming-from-payday-dev/?cid=OTC-RSS&attr=CVG-General-RSS

https://www.l4d.com/blog/post.php?id=8070

The name isn’t L4D: The Prequel ofc- at least as far as I can tell. If it is, that isn’t very clever.

Read full topic
